Description: Intelliflo widens access to financial advice through leading technology which powers the financial advisory experience. Open software architectures combined with unmatched industry experience simplify a complex digital landscape.
Name: Intelliflo

Methods.Name: Income Created Webhook
Methods.Description: Event is raised any time a income is created.

Methods.Name: Get Webhook
Methods.Description: Get a current webhook subscription.

Methods.Name: Delete Webhook (Manually)
Methods.Description: Deletes a subscription defined by the provided Webhook ID

Methods.Name: List Webhooks
Methods.Description: Lists all current webhook subscriptions.

Methods.Name: Client Address Updated Webhook
Methods.Description: Event is raised any time any client addresses are updated.

Methods.Name: Plan Deleted Webhook
Methods.Description: Event is raised any time a plan is deleted.

Methods.Name: Plan Created Webhook
Methods.Description: Event is raised any time a plan is created.

Methods.Name: Client Changed Webhook
Methods.Description: Event is raised any time a client is changed.

Methods.Name: Client Address Created Webhook
Methods.Description: Event is raised any time any client addresses are created.

Methods.Name: Client Contact Detail Updated Webhook
Methods.Description: Event is raised any time any client contact details are updated.

Methods.Name: Plan Status Updated Webhook
Methods.Description: Event is raised any time a plan status for a plan is updated.

Methods.Name: Client Created Webhook
Methods.Description: Event is raised any time a client is created.
